HotelElement.Name: Four Points by Sheraton Levis Convention Center

Description.Text: Facilities Guests can feel at home in one of the 150 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a restaurant, a dining area, a bar, room service, a conference room and a business centre. Wireless internet access in public areas allows travellers to stay connected. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel. In addition, a shuttle service is offered. Rooms The accommodation features rooms with air conditioning and a bathroom. A sofabed ensures a good night's sleep. Guests will also find a tea/coffee station included as standard. Other features include internet access, a telephone, a TV and WiFi. The bathroom offers convenient facilities including a shower. A hairdryer can also be found in each of the bathrooms. Special family rooms are available for families with children. Sports/Entertainment The sport and leisure options offer guests plenty to choose from during their free time. The establishment features a pool and an outdoor pool. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. The hotel offers a gym (for a fee) to travellers. Entertainment facilities include a nightclub. Meals The accommodation offers breakfast, lunch and dinner.
